Kiwi among 22 people on luxury boat that sank off Italy amid tornado; Six people remain missing https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kiwi-among-22-people-on-board-luxury-boat-that-sunk-off-italy-amid-tornado-six-people-remain-missing/ CKPKRTPCQZEAXMJ5ZI7YU5TNL4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kiwi-among-22-people-on-board-luxury-boat-that-sunk-off-italy-amid-tornado-six-people-remain-missing/ CKPKRTPCQZEAXMJ5ZI7YU5TNL4/ The body of one passenger has been located by local authorities. Mon, 19 Aug 2024 10:05:55 +0000 A local Facebook page shared a picture of the yacht Bayesian at anchor last night off the coast of Sicily before it sank near Palermo. Photo / via Facebook, Fabio La Bianca
St John to operate at 70% capacity during ambulance strikehttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/st-john-to-operate-at-70-capacity-during-ambulance-strike/WBBZGXSRH5HSFCZ4IA4KQ4SMPM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/st-john-to-operate-at-70-capacity-during-ambulance-strike/WBBZGXSRH5HSFCZ4IA4KQ4SMPM/ The strike will occur from 4am Tuesday to 4am Wednesday, and again on Saturday. Mon, 19 Aug 2024 08:51:49 +0000 New Zealand Ambulance Association and First Union members will withdraw labour for four hours from the start of each of their shifts.
Crown says stabbing of dog walker Nigel Wilson was ‘reckless killing’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crown-says-stabbing-of-dog-walker-nigel-wilson-was-reckless-killing/WLD5ZQJ3BRBBNJCQ7VZOBKQQUM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crown-says-stabbing-of-dog-walker-nigel-wilson-was-reckless-killing/WLD5ZQJ3BRBBNJCQ7VZOBKQQUM/ Bailey Messervy, 20, is charged with the murder of Nigel Wilson in Christchurch. National Party Facebook page comments on Koroneihana livestream say ‘Māori can never be united people’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/national-party-facebook-page-comments-on-koroneihana-livestream-say-maori-can-never-be-united-people/3ODRPUJDMNERHDCNFQNENWRQDY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/national-party-facebook-page-comments-on-koroneihana-livestream-say-maori-can-never-be-united-people/3ODRPUJDMNERHDCNFQNENWRQDY/ Daniel PereseNational apologises for comments made on Māngere page, say they don't reflect its views. Mon, 19 Aug 2024 08:04:40 +0000 The Māngere Electorate – New Zealand National Party Facebook page is under fire after leaving comments on Te Ao Māori News’ Facebook livestream of the political parties’ pōwhiri at Turangawaewae marae for the Koroneihana. Photos / Te Ao Māori News

Hamilton ‘invasion’ boy racer event: Police arrest 18yo for allegedly ramming cop car with ute https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hamilton-invasion-boy-racer-event-police-arrest-18yo-for-allegedly-ramming-cop-car-with-ute/EPTD4FLF7RGNXNQ5MLZYA3JOSE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hamilton-invasion-boy-racer-event-police-arrest-18yo-for-allegedly-ramming-cop-car-with-ute/EPTD4FLF7RGNXNQ5MLZYA3JOSE/ Raphael FranksOver 1000 people gathered on Saturday night.
